1_1CpQAAfxYtFqAGfoGd6gdaN6jerQGoknzV.body:
Thanks for you suggestion. Unfortunately, I'm no developer. I just like to fiddle around with stuff. Nofish is the guy who created ZeroTalk (which is used by 0list).

At the moment, if you want to search 0list, you can click the "Follow in Newsfeed" button, and then on your [**ZeroHello**](../1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D) start page should a search box appear.
As far as I recall, there exists a cool 0list clone which features a search function. Unfortunately, I don't remember its name, but I'm pretty sure the link is posted on 0list.
